My Christmas List 2019

Hello lovely family! I thought it might be lovely to deliver my Christmas list this year to you via my website - hooray!

This is a list of the things i'd like but please do not feel obliged to purchase every item on it!


This year I would be very grateful for the following:

  • A wonderful Christmas with my super family!
  • Dr Marten’s Vaux Black boots (I have a £10 gift voucher for schuh so if anyone fancies clubbing together for these, tell me and I’ll give you the voucher!)
  • A large saucepan (like the size of moms pressure cooker, but without a long handle) so we can make lots of soup.
  • A good hand-held soup blitzer
  • No chocolates please!
  • A game called grabolo if it's not expensive
  • Fluxx 5.0 card game

Thank you for reading my Christmas list. Please send me yours!xx
